The Graphical User Interface
----------------------------

The main window
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^


Extra window
^^^^^^^^^^^^
While the main window is allow you to have an overview of all the images you want to view it will not do much more. For that reason, three other windows have been implemented and are accessible from the main window through the different buttons (see previous section):

* The **zoom window**:
* The **comparison window**:
* The **cluster window**:
